section_1.label_title: Online Course on Capsule Hair Extensions
section_1.main_title: «ExHAIR Signature Technology for Unique Attachment» by Evgeniya Gromyko
section_1.description_1: ExHAIR is a method for creating perfect capsules, known for its durability, invisibility, and smart approach to selecting and distributing capsules on the head.
section_1.description_2: Thanks to the course, you will become a top master in your city and build a stable client flow.
